get.description: This operation allows you get a hello message

x-codeSamples.source:
import os
from cozmox_sdk import CozmoxSDK

client = CozmoxSDK(
    api_key=os.environ.get("COZMOX_API_KEY"),  # This is the default and can be omitted
)
response = client.nebula.hello()
print(response.message)

post.description: This operation allows you create a call

x-codeSamples.source:
import os
from cozmox_sdk import CozmoxSDK

client = CozmoxSDK(
    api_key=os.environ.get("COZMOX_API_KEY"),  # This is the default and can be omitted
)
response = client.outbound.create_call(
    agent_id="cx_xxxxxx",
    extras={
        "Name": "Liza",
        "current_datetime": "2025-01-01 10:10:10",
    },
    from_phone="+1234567890",
    to_phone="+1234567890",
)
print(response.call_id)

post.description: This operation allows you retrieve a call by id

x-codeSamples.source:
import os
from cozmox_sdk import CozmoxSDK

client = CozmoxSDK(
    api_key=os.environ.get("COZMOX_API_KEY"),  # This is the default and can be omitted
)
response = client.outbound.retrieve_call(
    call_id="1234567890",
)
print(response.agent)

get.description: This operation allows you get the number of concurrent calls for a user

x-codeSamples.source:
import os
from cozmox_sdk import CozmoxSDK

client = CozmoxSDK(
    api_key=os.environ.get("COZMOX_API_KEY"),  # This is the default and can be omitted
)
response = client.concurrency.hello()
print(response.consumed_concurrency)

agentId.description: Agent ID which will communicate with user

extras.description: Extra parameters needed for agent on call

createdAt.description: The date and time the call was created

initialContext.description: The initial context of the call

fromPhone.description: The phone number of the caller

disconnect_reason.description: The disconnect reason of the call

extraContext.description: The extra variables of the call

analysis.description: The analysis fields of the call

recording_url.description: The recording url of the call
